title: Murray Traded to Start Free Agency Day!
description:
The Hawks make a major move, flipping three picks and a swap plus Gallinari for Dejounte Murray. We break down the cost, and his fit with Trae Young as the new backcourt of the future for the Atlanta Hawks. Plus! Harden declines his option, Deandre Ayton's perilous position, and some SLEEPER free agents from David Jacoby wearing a suit! All that and more on Jalen & Jacoby's free agency spectacular. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
